featured.text: The moral lesson is “First 35 your strengths, and then change the playing field to suit them.”
According to the passage, which of the following statements is true? (A) Different dogs display strengths in different intelligences.
From Turkey, she boarded gained strength in body and mind.
In view of all these strengths, in the 1930s the United States and Canada undertook a research project in which they managed to breed an especially nutritious soybean with a high oil content.

definition.en_def: The quality or state of being strong; the capacity to withstand force or pressure.
definition.example: She showed great strength in overcoming her challenges.
